title: The Kowalewski top in the SUSY quantum mechanics
abstract: The Kowalewski top on Lie algebras $o(4)$, $e(3)$ and $o(3,1)$ is embedded in the SUSY quantum mechanics. In two dimensions we give the new prescription for construction of the pairs of integrable systems by using a standard SUSY algebra. At the proposed scheme the Goryachev-Chapligin top is shown to be a natural partner of the Kowalewski top.
